game.name: Kami: Parade of Senses
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The parade of senses begins and you are forced to become its participant. So make the most of the situation! Explore the Kami Space, help to other forced, who have been trapped here, look for answers to questions, betray, kill... or spare and protect.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The parade of senses begins and you are forced to become its participant. So make the most of the situation! Explore the Kami Space, help to other forced, who have been trapped here, look for answers to questions, betray, kill... or spare and protect.
